versos: (divine) "Therefore, as Gods chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience." - Colossians 3:12 NIV;;;
(gave) "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life." - John 3:16;;;
(forth) "And the sons of Gomer; Ashkenaz, and Riphath, and Togarmah." - Genesis 10:3;;;
(writing) 2 Timothy 3:16 - "All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness.";;;
(peter) Matthew 16:18 - And I tell you that you are peter
(seen) John 1:18 - "No one has ever seen God; the only God, who is at the Father's side, he has made him known.";;;
(profit) 1 Timothy 6:5 - "Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds, and destitute of the truth, supposing that gain is godliness: from such withdraw thyself.";;;
(come) Matthew 11:28 - "come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.";;;
(rather) Philippians 2:3 - "Do nothing out of selfish ambition or vain conceit. rather, in humility value others above yourselves.";;;
(sort) Nehemiah 7:5 - Then my God put it into my heart to assemble the nobles
(unknown) 1 Corinthians 14:2 - "For anyone who speaks in a tongue does not speak to people but to God. Indeed, no one understands them; they utter mysteries by the Spirit.";;;
(esteemed) 1 Thessalonians 5:13 - "and to esteem them very highly in love because of their work. Be at peace among yourselves.";;;
(better) Ecclesiastes 7:1 - A good name is better than fine perfume
(devised) Psalm 140:2 - "who devise evil plans in their hearts and stir up war every day.";;;
(namely) Romans 3:29 - Or is God the God of Jews only Is he not the God of Gentiles too Yes
(teachers) Romans 2:20 - "an instructor of the foolish, a teacher of infants, because you have in the law the embodiment of knowledge and truth.";;;
(john) 3 john 1:4 - I have no greater joy than to hear that my children are walking in the truth.;;;
